title: Redemption: Episode One: Messenger of God: Iran Attacks
description: IRAN ATTACKS! How will Iran answer the US withdrawal from The Iran Nuclear Deal and the recent designation of the Iranian Revolutionary Guard as a terrorist organization? We all know they are going to answer â€“ the only question is HOW!This Messenger of God story provides a dramatic answer to that question. Presented in the form of a Harry Miles short-short story which the reader can read in 15 minutes, this story is ripped from the headlines. Iran attacks!
author: Ed Benjamin
